text:
Joseph Michael "Joe" McDade (September 29, 1931 – September 24, 2017) was a an American politician. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives, having represented Pennsylvania's 10th congressional district from 1963 through 1999 as a Republican.
McDade died on September 24, 2017 in Fairfax, Virginia of heart failure at the age of 85.
